name: elmerfem
description:
Elmer is an open source multiphysical simulation software. It includes
physical models of fluid dynamics, structural mechanics,
electromagnetics, heat transfer and acoustics.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: qt
dependencies.description: Qt is a comprehensive cross-platform C++ application framework.

dependencies.name: qwt
dependencies.description:
The Qwt library contains GUI Components and utility classes which are
primarily useful for programs with a technical background. Beside a
framework for 2D plots it provides scales, sliders, dials, compasses,
thermometers, wheels and knobs to control or display values, arrays, or
ranges of type double.

dependencies.name: paraview
dependencies.description:
ParaView is an open-source, multi-platform data analysis and
visualization application. This package includes the Catalyst in-situ
library for versions 5.7 and greater, otherwise use the catalyst
package.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
MPItrampoline: A forwarding MPI implementation that can use any other
MPI implementation via an MPI ABI.

dependencies.name: netcdf-fortran
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the Fortran
distribution.

dependencies.name: scalapack
dependencies.description:
ScaLAPACK is a library of high-performance linear algebra routines for
parallel distributed memory machines. It depends on external libraries
including BLAS and LAPACK for Linear Algebra computations. AMD's
optimized version of ScaLAPACK enables using BLIS and LibFLAME library
that have optimized dense matrix functions and solvers for AMD EPYC
processor family CPUs.

dependencies.name: mumps
dependencies.description: MUMPS: a MUltifrontal Massively Parallel sparse direct Solver

dependencies.name: hypre
dependencies.description:
Hypre is a library of high performance preconditioners that features
parallel multigrid methods for both structured and unstructured grid
problems.

dependencies.name: trilinos
dependencies.description:
The Trilinos Project is an effort to develop algorithms and enabling
technologies within an object-oriented software framework for the
solution of large-scale, complex multi-physics engineering and
scientific problems. A unique design feature of Trilinos is its focus on
packages.

dependencies.name: zoltan
dependencies.description:
The Zoltan library is a toolkit of parallel combinatorial algorithms for
parallel, unstructured, and/or adaptive scientific applications.
Zoltan's largest component is a suite of dynamic load-balancing and
partitioning algorithms that increase applications' parallel performance
by reducing idle time. Zoltan also has graph coloring and graph ordering
algorithms, which are useful in task schedulers and parallel
preconditioners.

dependencies.name: lua
dependencies.description: The Lua programming language interpreter and library.

dependencies.name: nn-c
dependencies.description:
nn: Natural Neighbours interpolation. nn is a C code for Natural
Neighbours interpolation of 2D scattered data. It provides a C library
and a command line utility nnbathy.

dependencies.name: csa-c
dependencies.description:
csa: Cubic Spline Approximation. csa is a C code for cubic spline
approximation of 2D scattered data. It provides a C library and a
command line utility csabathy.
